name: AMERICAN MUNICIPAL POWER, et al., petitioners, v. ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCY, et al.
name_abbreviation: Am. Mun. Power v. Envtl. Prot. Agency

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
AMERICAN MUNICIPAL POWER, et al., petitioners,
v.
ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCY, et al.
attorneys: Motion of Southeastern Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of Washington Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.
casebody.head_matter:
AMERICAN MUNICIPAL POWER, et al., petitioners,
v.
ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCY, et al.
No. 16-1168.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 26, 2017.
Motion of Southeastern Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of Washington Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.
